definitions.definition: A municipality or subdivision of a municipality in Spanish America, and in Spain itself.
A slum on the periphery of a major city, or a low to middle-class neighborhood in a lesser city, in Venezuela or the Dominican Republic.
An area or neighborhood in a US city inhabited predominantly by Spanish-speakers or people of Hispanic origin.

main_definition: A municipality or subdivision of a municipality in Spanish America, and in Spain itself.
secondary_definitions: A slum on the periphery of a major city, or a low to middle-class neighborhood in a lesser city, in Venezuela or the Dominican Republic.
( Philippines ) A rural barangay or neighborhood.
( informal , US ) An area or neighborhood in a US city inhabited predominantly by Spanish-speakers or people of Hispanic origin.
